name: Garithes Yiouvetsi
author: MARYANNG
summary: This classic Greek shrimp dish is baked with a tomato sauce and topped with feta cheese.  Relatively quick and simple to make. This recipe goes wonderfully with rice pilaf and some crusty bread.
directions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat
Saute onion in oil until transparent
Stir in green onions and garlic; cook, stirring frequently, for 2 more minutes
Stir in tomatoes, wine, most of the parsley, oregano, and salt and pepper to taste
Cover, and simmer gently for 30 minutes
Preheat oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C)
Spread half the sauce on the bottom of a large oven dish
Arrange shrimp evenly over sauce, and pour the remaining sauce on top
Cook in preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes, until shrimp are pink and the feta is melted and lightly browned
Sprinkle with remaining parsley, and serve immediately
